```{r}
devtools::install_github("walkerkq/openlibraryR")
library(openlibraryR)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(jsonlite)
```
```{r}
frankie <- get_books(book_id = '0517530716')
str(frankie)
```
```{r}
f_subjects <- frankie %>%
  select(subjects) %>%
  unnest(subjects, names_sep = "_")
```
```{r}
library(jsonlite)
horror <- fromJSON("https://openlibrary.org/subjects/horror_stories.json")
```


```{r}
horror_authors <- horror$works %>%
  select(authors) %>%
  unnest(cols = c(authors)) %>%
  relocate(key, after=name)
```

```{r}
auth_ct <- horror_authors %>% summarize(count(name))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
auth_ct <- horror$author %>% summarize(count(name)) 
  ggplot() + geom_col()
```
